name: Central Centre 5 min walk to/from Central MTR
description: Located right in the heart of Central, this 2 bed room apartment with nice furnishings is the perfect drop spot for a visit to Hong Kong.  Restaurants,shops,antiques,etc.  From traditional to ultra modern part of Hong Kong, everything is within reach
host_about: I was born in California and raised in Hong Kong. Went to college in the states and returned to Hong Kong a few years ago.  I absolutely love travelling around the region but Hong Kong has always welcomed me home and I look forward to showing off my home town and sharing all the little insights and local specialities with all my guests!

name: Mixed Dorm Bed#1@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.
neighbourhood: Wan Chai, Hong Kong

name: Modern family-friendly suite in fishing village
description:
Our property is located in Tai O on Lantau Island, Hong Kong's largest and most unspoiled outlying island. Lantau is an off-track destination for those who look to escape to an alternative Hong Kong.

Tai O itself is a charming, traditional fishing village. We offer a comfortable home away from home so that guests can have time to explore and appreciate the crude beauty which is not possible to be found in downtown Hong Kong.
neighborhood_overview: Tai O villagers still lead a simple life. Unlike the urban fellow citizens, folks here are used to getting up very early and enjoy morning tea in the convivial atmosphere of local teahouses or “cha chaan teng”. Local restaurants serve the last call around 8 pm and are usually closed by 9 pm. Late night dining is only possible in a handful of small eateries. There are no chain supermarkets, convenient stores and fast food joints. Visitors will truly enjoy tranquility here though some conveniences have to be compromised. No vehicles are allowed beyond the parking area/ bus terminus/ taxi stand.
host_about:
Hi, I am Veronica, your host at Espace Elastique, and I am ready to greet you in Cantonese, Putonghua, English, français, suomi y un poquito español.

Espace Elastique (pronounced ɛspas elastic) consists of a B&B, boutique hotel style accommodation and a cafè in Tai O on Lantau Island, Hong Kong's largest and most unspoiled outlying island. Lantau is an off-track destination for those who look to escape to an alternative Hong Kong.

"Being elegantly simple" is our attitude. Our company's mission is to help sustain Tai O's crude beauty by offering our guests a comfortable home from home so that they will have time to explore and appreciate this charming traditional fishing village.
neighbourhood: Hong Kong

name: Modern 2BR Seaview apt with balcony/1min MTR
description: Experience the best of Hong Kong from our centrally located apartment in Yau Ma Tei. Just 1 min to MTR station, 15 mins to Central, 5 mins to Mongkok, and 10 mins to Tsim Sha Tsui. This rare find offers 2 bedroom, a spacious layout, and a balcony with stunning sunset views. Fully equipped kitchen, coffee machine, 2 toilets, and an office station make it perfect for digital nomads and business travelers. Don't miss this opportunity to lease our Airbnb apartment
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to the vibrant neighborhood of Yau Ma Tei, the perfect base for your stay in Hong Kong. Known for its rich cultural heritage and bustling atmosphere, Yau Ma Tei offers a unique blend of old and new, showcasing the city's dynamic energy.

Located in the heart of Hong Kong, Yau Ma Tei boasts excellent connectivity. With the MTR station just a stone's throw away, you can easily explore the city and reach major attractions within minutes. Central, the financial hub of Hong Kong, is a short 15-minute ride, while Mongkok and Tsim Sha Tsui, renowned for their shopping and entertainment, are just 5 and 10 minutes away, respectively.

Immerse yourself in the local culture by exploring the vibrant streets of Yau Ma Tei. Visit the iconic Temple Street Night Market, where you can find a plethora of local street food, souvenirs, and bargain deals. Take a stroll along Shanghai Street, known for its shops selling traditional Chinese crafts, fabrics, and antiques. For a tas
neighbourhood: Hong Kong, Kowloon, Hong Kong

name: 3 BR hidden gem over hideaway beach
description:
Modernised bright & breezy full sea view apartment overlooking a hideaway beach.
Tranquil surroundings. Views towards Disney & Hong Kong harbour.
Free WIFI & multi-channel TV.
View photo album for various children bed set designs for bedroom themes.
neighborhood_overview:
Panoramic views towards Hong Kong Harbour.

Discovery Bay consists of a piazza with a strip of restaurants for alfresco dining, and the outdoor seating is very popular with most facing the promenade and overlooking the beach and Tai Pak Bay, or Disney in the horizon for nightly firework displays. Wi-Fi broadband connection is available free of charge at the eateries, along the beach and in the main plaza.

Discovery Bay Residents Club & Siena Clubhouse:-
For terms of 28 nights or more, access to Discovery Bay Clubhouses can be requested but all admin. fees and membership fees will be borne by the guest.

We have also have a private 7-seater car for additional leisure activities and photo field tours of HK for our guests, so you can always ask for more details if you are interested to do some field trips in various locations of HK.

For those who enjoy outdoor activities, you may also like to ask us about hiking trails or hire inflatable kaya
host_about:
I am Chinese & was brought up in the UK and born in Malaysia, but lived in Hong Kong for over 30 years now.

My childhood was spent mainly travelling around with my family of  5 siblings as my father was stationed at several British Army bases around Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong & the UK. Therefore, I enjoy travelling & meeting people of different cultures.

I have travelled to Europe & the States during my student days & most of my family members have now settled in the States & the UK.

I preferred to settle in Hong Kong as the place is as vibrant as the people who play hard, & work hard here. Hong Kong has a 'buzz' you cannot find anywhere else in the world. 

It has been interesting living through the changes from the British colonial days to the handover back to China, & being part of 'history', & revealing of the versatility of the people here to the changing times to not just strive, but thrive in various aspects of their lives & livelihood.

Hong Kong brings out the best & worst in you... ^_^

name: A:2BR for 6ppl 3mins to MongKok MTR
description:
PLEASE read the description of the flat before you make your reservation! Thank you!

Great value for Excellent access to all the high lights of kowloon. 3 minutes walk from MK station, 2 minutes from Nathan Road, the night market and birdcage walk.
neighborhood_overview:
The streets lined with shopping malls, open-air bazaars with a wide variety of shops around.

Within walking distance , you can easily reach large shopping malls like - Langham Place , New Century Plaza , Sino Centre , Hollywood shopping center , the first of the square , the trend of the SAR , the new city center and the Grand Tower etc.

Mong Kok streets are famous for its unique characteristics , such as Western Choi Street , Sneaker Street , Kwong Wah Street ( gun Street ) , Ladies Street, Bird Street , Garden Street , Flower Market Street , Goldfish Street etc.

Mong Kok is a shopping paradise where you can buy whatever you could think of and easy to get lovely or freaky interesting souvenirs back for family and friends, it is definitely worthy to have a walk around even not interested in buying anything.

Thousand restaurants downstairs offer different style of food from all over the world that you could absolutely get excited about!

She always sings

name: Wanchai cozy 3BR+2Bath for 5 (Heart of HK)
description:
Located in the heart of Wanchai, the fully furnished apartment has 3 bedrooms (1 double bed, 1 single bed (bunk) and 1 bunk bed), 2 bathrooms with showers and is equipped with a kitchen and a washing machine.

The apartment is about a 5 min walk from the Wan Chai MTR station, and is also close to trams and buses. There are countless restaurants and shops in the neighbourhood.

Pls understand apartments in HK might not be as spacious as those in your home country. Our 3 single beds are bunk beds.
neighborhood_overview:
Very convenient for everything. And most people staying in this district are very friendly.

Where to go and what to do in HK?
A: There are lots of things to do in Hong Kong. I suggest the following websites where the most updated information is summarized:
Timeout - HK
KLOOK - HK
Discoverhongkong

For foods in HK, local people use this website and think they are reliable:
OPENRICE - HK
All restaurants in Wanchai District and most restaurants in Causeway Bay District are within walking distance.

host_about:
嗨､親愛的朋友們､我喜歡認識､結交五湖四海､有素質､有禮貌的朋友､我也希望在香港為朋友們提供溫馨的家､家不需要很豪華､很大的地方､只要簡單､干淨､整洁､釆光､通風､家電廚具､生活用品齊全､睡覺安靜､溫馨已經足夠､這是我對家的要求､希望朋友們會喜歡我們香港的家喔､等你､､､､回家!
香港恋家公寓,立足于香港最兴旺的旺角商圈,无论是您需要就近旺角购物,还是在油麻地享受香港美食,我们都有精心设计的房源提供,所有房间摆设温馨,床上用品一客人一换,坚持高标准服务｡所有房屋都选定靠近香港地铁的位置,地铁到尖沙咀､铜锣湾､深港口岸､火车站､迪士尼､机场

name: INCREDIBLE Architect Design DUPLEX
description:
oOo ENTIRE Second Floor Unit only oOo

Rare village house from the 1980s sitting on the hillside overlooking the rich green mountains and concrete city from a distance. Located about 3-5mins walk from Shatin MTR, this is truly a hidden gem sheltered by nature. Safe and secured location requiring to take some stairs to reach an architect designed home. BOOK EARLY!
neighborhood_overview:
- Nature oriented village.
- Located near tourist attraction points, the duplex owns its private spot in the area.
- Town Centre / New Town Plaza is the biggest and busiest shopping mall in New Territories. 9 floors high with over 400 stores. (Opening hours: Monday - Sunday 10am - 10pm).
- Ideal for students in: (i) City University of Hong Kong / CityUHK, (ii) Chinese University of Hong Kong / CUHK, (iii) Hong Kong Design Institue / HKDI
- Local restaurants are only 2 minutes walk; the area is also near: (i)Government offices, (ii)JP Morgan, (iii)IKEA.
host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that. I love architecture and continuously think of new ways to offer a home feeling to my guests. I turn my guests into friends, so I know the key ingredients of a 5* stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.

name: Female Dorm Bed#2@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

name: Entire House 4 BR & 4 T/B (8-11pax)-Long Term Stay
description:
We are happy to host you in Hong Kong

Long Term (1 month or above)
- negotiable, in case you prefer to stay long with us
neighborhood_overview:
We are nestled in the heart of Kowloon Central, in the centre of Jordan and TST Nathan Road. Public transportation is accessible including MTR, the fastest vehicle to reach all destinations in Hong Kong.

Going to the West side of our place is 2 minutes walk to Kowloon Park and 15 mins walk going to straight direction is a West Kowloon Promenade, Harbour City and Elements (Shopping Mall), West Kowloon Station (High Speed Rail connecting to China) as well as Hong Kong Macau Ferry.

Going to South Direction is Tsim Sha Tsui area, 10 mins walk to Avenue of Stars, Cultural Centre and HK Space Museum.

To the East is going to the direction of Polytechnic University, Hung Hom KCR station and TST east, Science Museum and Rosary Church.

To the North side is walking distance to Temple Street Night market or Two (2) MTR stops to Mong Kok Ladies Market & Nelson Street (Rubber Shoe Market), a place famous for all branded rubber shoes in good price.
host_about:
I live to eat! So I travel to meet new friends, see new places and explore different delicacies of different places in the world! 

I am a Filipina and my husband Ken is a local HK person. As a host, we match most of our guest expectations. We are hospitable and friendly family and we put cleanliness of our premises as priority. HK is also our expertise being a residence here for few decades. We give good tips to our guest to maximize their enjoyment during their stay in HK. We will be happy to host all kinds of tourist in HK coming from different parts of the world and from all walks of life.

我住的吃!所以,我出差到结识新朋友,看到新的地方,探索在世界不同的地方不同的美味佳肴!

我是菲律宾人,我的丈夫肯是当地的香港人士｡作为东道主,我们最符合我们的客户的期望｡我们是好客和友好的家庭,我们把我们的场地作为优先清洁度｡香港也是我们的专长在这里是一个住所几十年｡我们给予好的建议给我们的客人他们在香港逗留期间,最大限度地发挥他们的享受｡我们将很乐意举办香港各类游客来自世界各地和各行各业的到来｡

Three story house, bright and contemporary, 2100 sq ft, with lovely garden in a quiet area. Big master bedroom with en-suite large bathroom with Jacuzzi.
Views on Lantau mountains.
-20'to airport.
-7' walk to beach.

host_about:
I am French and have been living for 40 years in Hong Kong. I am now retired and spend half of my time travelling and in my house in the Alpes de Haute Provence. 
Both in France and in Hong Kong I enjoy walking in the mountains and outdoor activities. 
My house has lots of CDs ,music of all kind, DVDs, books and adult and kid bikes

name: 新装修 四房四卫 可住10-17人
description: Newly renovated, near subway exit, convenient transportation, personally picked up
host_about: 本人房源都在旺角女人街，有双人、三人、四人、五人,一房一厅、两房、三房最多入住8-12人公寓套房（房间详情请与我联系）本公寓提供舒适整洁、交通便捷及价格实惠的客房。公寓座落于旺角繁盛地带，离地铁站只需步行5分钟即可到达，无论是您需要就近旺角购物，还是在油麻地享受香港美食，我们都有精心设计的房源提供，所有房间摆设温馨，床上用品一客人一换，坚持高标准服务。每间房间都有窗、有独立卫浴，房间内设有彩电、空调、免费无线wi-fi、转换插头、每个房间提供24小时热水供应、毛巾、拖鞋、衣架、热水壶、洗漱用品及洗浴用品等。房间由专人负责打扫，专人负责看护，干净整洁，安全性高。戴大姐在这欢迎各位租客入组，选择香港汇丽精品公寓，让你有家的舒适,家的温暖，家的安全感。

Four-bedroom unit, private gate, balcony, suitable for family size and friends tourist accommodation. The house is located at the foot of the Phoenix Mountain and Tongchong Bay, just a ten-minute drive to the airport and the Asian Expo Museum.
6 ｡: 6 ｡: walk to the road in a small village, 6 min walk to the road.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the Dongchong River Plain. There are rivers, mangroves and wetlands, and the ecological value is extremely high. There are several ancient villages and ancient ruins on the plain (Hou Wangjing, Ancient Turret, Ancient Tower and Luohan Temple), and the humanistic value is as high. At the same time, the rapid development of Dongchong City, the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge and the third runway of the airport are under construction. There are tall residential buildings and large shopping malls in the city. Dongchong is a typical new town in Hong Kong.
Guests can easily play and experience Dongchong's nature, modernization, and the alternation of old and new.

description: We are  at the centre of Kowloon, in a vibrant neighbourhood. There are many shops and restaurants where you can sample the local and int'l cuisine. Convenience stores  and a supermarket just downstairs. 5 mins walk to Hong Kong most famous Temple Street Night Market. Canton Road with all the luxury shops is just 8 mins walk.The closet MTR Austin station is 3 mins walk, from there is only one stop to Tsim Sha Tsui. Element圓方shopping centre ( Kowloon airport express station) only 8 minutes walk.
neighborhood_overview:
This flat is in a vibrant neighborhood. Downstairs, there are many shops and restaurants where you can sample the local cuisine, as well as a supermarket. Many eating options, and souvenirs too, are also available in the famous Temple Street Night Market, located just five minutes away on foot. Make sure to look for Tin Hau Temple, one of the oldest temples in the neighborhood and a major landmark. It is north of the expressway. And while you are in the neighborhood, make sure you do not miss the Jade Market off Kansu Street. It is also nearby.

For a luxury shopping experience, walk 10 minutes to Tsim Sha Tsui’s Canton Road, or walk to the Elements mall, located just ten minutes away under the ICC, Hong Kong’s tallest building. You can even top off a trip to the mall with a visit to the ICC’s Ozone, the world’s highest bar. The view from the 118th floor is stunning. Round off your trip with a short MTR ride to Tsim Sha Tsui. That’s where the best nighttime harbor views are f

Immediately downstairs, there is also a bus station to most places in Guangdong province. My upgraded apartment is situated on the 2nd floor of the building so you have to use the staircase for two storeys.

Leave Mongkok Core Shopping Area in 5 points.My turn is the Yau Ma Tei subway exit.There is also a Yongdong bus stop on the opposite road, which can directly reach most parts of Guangdong.It's easy to come. My house has been renovated for more than a year, but the floor is on the second floor of the building, so it takes two stairs.

Hot sale

host_about: 喜歡結識朋友，每年我也會到不同的地方旅遊！人在旅途中有种人在异乡为异客的感触，此刻想家的感觉油然而生。我一直都是很用心经营的，希望让你们感觉这里就是你的家，有回家的感覺！本人很喜欢清潔乾淨，每次在朋友們入住前,都会先更换床单被套及打扫，所以房屋保证整潔卫生！干淨､整洁､生活用品齊全､睡覺安靜，這是我對家的要求。同时我希望可以和你们成为朋友！希望朋友們會喜歡我香港的家喔！

name: 香港旺角近地铁E2出口 精装修 温馨两房住5人 干净舒适
description:
It is a one-bedroom and one-living room type, but the living room is used as a bedroom. The living room is equipped with a 1.2-meter bed that can accommodate 2 people + one upper and lower mother bed can sleep 3 people. The room can accommodate 1 single bed in total 5 people.Other facilities in the room are also very well equipped, such as air conditioner, TV, electric kettle, adapter, hair dryer, high-speed free wifi internet, 24-hour hot shower, etc., so you don't have to worry about as much as you can; there is also a private bathroom in the room, so you can enjoy your private space;
We provide slippers in your room
host_about: 本人房源都在旺角女人街，有双人、三人、四人、五人,一房一厅、两房、三房最多入住8-12人公寓套房（房间详情请与我联系）本公寓提供舒适整洁、交通便捷及价格实惠的客房。公寓座落于旺角繁盛地带，离地铁站只需步行5分钟即可到达，无论是您需要就近旺角购物，还是在油麻地享受香港美食，我们都有精心设计的房源提供，所有房间摆设温馨，床上用品一客人一换，坚持高标准服务。每间房间都有窗、有独立卫浴，房间内设有彩电、空调、免费无线wi-fi、转换插头、每个房间提供24小时热水供应、毛巾、拖鞋、衣架、热水壶、洗漱用品及洗浴用品等。房间由专人负责打扫，专人负责看护，干净整洁，安全性高。戴大姐在这欢迎各位租客入组，选择香港汇丽精品公寓，让你有家的舒适,家的温暖，家的安全感。

name: Female Dorm Bed#4@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

name: Executive Premier Apartment 2BR 1min TST MTR K11
description:
Welcome back my dear guests!

Welcome to the unique and ultimate 2.0 Airbnb experience!

My brand new apartment is fully renovated in a luxurious, spacious and modern style.
700sqft (66sqm) net size of pure design and comfort to make you have a wonderful time in the great city of Hong Kong.

Located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, my building has 3 direct exits to MTR. It is 1min from K11 famous shopping mall, 5min from Avenue of Stars, 8min from China Ferry Terminal.
neighborhood_overview:
I love my district as it is in the heart of TSIM SHA TSUI.
There are 3 MTR (subway) exits around my building, literally less than 1min walk.
It is the most convenient as it is on Nathan Road, the famous and large street full of malls, fancy shops qnd tasty restaurants.
- you can easily go to shopping malls such as K11 (2min walk) or The One (5min walk).
- the Avenue of Stars is 7min walk.
- many restaurants and street food all around!
- KNUTSFORD TERRACE is just 5min by walk! Here you can enjoy many bars, exotic restaurants, clubs, pools..

I hope you will enjoy as much as I do!
host_about:
Hi everybody!

I am Lyna from Hong Kong. I am an architect and I spent the last few month renovating my apartment in a luxurious and comfortable way. I am sure you will love staying there!

Airbnb is a great way to meet people from all over the world, and it allows me to rent my spacious apartment when I am travelling.

Travelling is my hobby, so most of the time I'm out of town.
Hong Kong city is amazing, beautiful and full of energy, there is always plenty of things to do.

I hope you will like it!

name: Newly Modern Luxe Lofts 3 Rooms Apartment
description:
Luxe Living Meets Urban Splendor in the Heart of Hong Kong!

Embark on a captivating odyssey through architectural brilliance as Vicael's visionary Interior Designer unveils the timeless allure of weathered brick walls harmoniously entwined with contemporary design marvels. Brace yourself for more than just an apartment; this is a transformative voyage that seamlessly intertwines history and modernity in a symphony of opulent industrial elegance.

Apartment is 3-min walking distance to Metro!
neighborhood_overview:
Sham Shui Po is one of the densest and most vibrant neighbourhoods in Hong Kong. It has a diverse mix of migrants, working-class familie. Sham Shui Po has many lively street markets, electronics outlets, fabric stores, restaurants and food vendors. It is also famous as a red light district on Fuk Wa Street, and Golden Shopping Centre for bargain electronics and accessories.

For those who are looking for electronics and accessories, the Apliu Street market is well known in Hong Kong. The vendors in this open-air street market sells a wide variety of products at reasonable prices, allowing individuals to trade second hand goods here. Different shops sell a variety of goods including industrial electronics, analog and digital radio communications equipment, disco effects equipment, crockery, 1940s-era radios, LPs, torches, and audiophile hi-fi amplifiers in various stages of repair. The Hong Kong government promotes Apliu Street as Hong Kong's answer to Akihabara (in Japan).
host_about:
Hi there, I am a New York architect and interior designer, I moved to Hong Kong in summer 2017, and this incredible city has been my home ever since. 

I run my own businesses and travel regularly for my jobs and for leisure of course! Blessed with the proximity to other fantastic places nearby, I have been busy travelling extensively around Asia ever since I arrived in HK, including Tibet, Nepal, Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Bali etc. 

In my spare time, I enjoy going on the many fantastic hikes in HK, sipping bubble tea and cold beer on the beach, yoga, jazz, good coffee and a good book.

When I travel abroad I always use Airbnb. For me, a clean, comfortable and safe place to stay is essential. This is exactly what I offer to any guests staying with me. I hope that my place will be a little home-away-from-home for you during your time in HK.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Vic

name: 1.5 Comfy Pod. Friendly Staff. Mixed Dorm
description: The Mahjong is Hong Kong's first boutique hostel, centrally located in an authentic local neighbourhood - Tokwawan.
neighborhood_overview: The Mahjong neighbourhood is a foodie's paradise and still a best kept secret amongst locals.
host_about:
Founded by backpackers and soultrippers, The Mahjong is the result of years of pursuing a dream to establish a comfortable boutique hostel that offers cultural immersion in addition to a social exchange for travelers to meet and swap stories.

The Mahjong takes its name from a traditional game that dates back to late Qing dynasty when locals gathered together over a table of 144 game pieces to play and while away the days. Today, the game has evolved into a national pastime and is played everywhere – at home, in the park, even dedicated mahjong parlours around the city. There are various legends on how the game got its name – one being the Mahjong sparrow it was named after, for its petite yet agile body that resembled the game pieces.

麻雀雖小五臟俱全

“Mahjong is small but has everything it needs”

description:

I am very happy to welcome you back now that this covid episode is over!

My brand new apartment is fully renovated in a luxurious, spacious and modern style.
700sqft (66sqm) net size of pure design and comfort to make you have a wonderful time in the great city of Hong Kong.

It's located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui district. It is 1min from K11 famous shopping mall, 5min from Avenue of Stars, 8min from China Ferry Terminal.
neighborhood_overview:
I love my district as it is in the heart of TSIM SHA TSUI.
There are 3 MTR (subway) exits around my building, literally less than 1min walk.
It is the most convenient as it is on Nathan Road, the famous and large street full of malls, fancy shops qnd tasty restaurants.
- you can easily go to shopping malls such as K11 (2min walk) or The One (5min walk).
- the Avenue of Stars is 7min walk.
- many restaurants and street food all around!
- KNUTSFORD TERRACE is just 5min by walk! Here you can enjoy many bars, exotic restaurants, clubs, pools..

I hope you will enjoy as much as I do!
host_about:
Hi everybody!

I am Lyna from Hong Kong. I am an architect and I spent the last few month renovating my apartment in a luxurious and comfortable way. I am sure you will love staying there!

Airbnb is a great way to meet people from all over the world, and it allows me to rent my spacious apartment when I am travelling.

Travelling is my hobby, so most of the time I'm out of town.
Hong Kong city is amazing, beautiful and full of energy, there is always plenty of things to do.

I hope you will like it!

Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

host_about:
你好,我係Sam,是土生土長香港人｡從小到大,我都喜歡背包旅行, 以前覺得香港天空好小, 好羨慕外國的天空好大,四圍都有綠油油的森林和草地｡望住天空,就好想走去看看天空另一面的世界是怎樣｡15歲那年暑假決定出走一次,帶住背包,一個人闖蕩西藏旅行45日,從此,一發不可收拾!

記得最激一次,是大學跟四位同學從廣州徒步到內蒙古｡經歷70多日的艱苦路程,回憶畢身難忘｡每一次旅程,除了令人難忘的風景,跟當地人的交流互動,都是每一次旅行都獨一無二的重要原素｡所以我希望透過開辦民宿旅館,認識世界各地不同的客人,希望我可以代表香港,歡迎每一位來到我們家的客人｡讓大家感受香港人這個城市的人情味和好客之道｡

name: (WF3-CM)尖沙咀，距離地鐵站6分鐘路程，鄰近科學館，各國食府及大型商場林立，2房，空間寬躺
description:
Located in Tsim Sha Tsui, 6 minutes from Tsim Sha Tsui Harbour Railway exit P3, near Hong Kong History Museum and Hong Kong Science Museum with plenty of interesting exhibitions and entertainment options.If you love shopping, you can't miss the big shopping centers nearby - TheOne, Melbourne and the nearby K11, iSquare and more.In addition to Hong Kong's specialty street food, Tsim Sha Tsui is also home to Michelin-starred restaurants and local cuisine. The apartment is newly furnished, has a fallen lobby that can accommodate multiple people, 2 rooms have double beds, and has a private bathroom and kitchen, making it the best choice for groups and families.

Have you used the Airbnb before? Sign up with my link and you will get up to $399 HKD off your first trip by $399 HKD. https://www.airbnb.com.hk/c/SAMN2162?s=13&referral_share_id=9cb71ef9-a47e-4af6-b57d-8e3fa0e650d4

host_about:
嗨､親愛的朋友們､我喜歡認識､結交五湖四海､有素質､有禮貌的朋友､我也希望在香港為朋友們提供溫馨的家､家不需要很豪華､很大的地方､只要簡單､干淨､整洁､釆光､通風､家電廚具､生活用品齊全､睡覺安靜､溫馨已經足夠､這是我對家的要求､希望朋友們會喜歡我們香港的家喔､等你､､､､回家!
香港恋家公寓,立足于香港最兴旺的旺角商圈,无论是您需要就近旺角购物,还是在油麻地享受香港美食,我们都有精心设计的房源提供,所有房间摆设温馨,床上用品一客人一换,坚持高标准服务｡所有房屋都选定靠近香港地铁的位置,地铁到尖沙咀､铜锣湾､深港口岸､火车站､迪士尼､机场

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

name: (HL) 尖沙咀 2房大廳 3床 加連威老道 5分鐘直達地鐵站 適合2-6人入住
description: Located in Tsim Sha Tsui, 5 minutes from the exit B2 of Tsim Tsui, close to the big shopping mall TheOne, beautiful gorgeous and nearby K11, iSquare, etc.If you like museums, you must not miss the surrounding Hong Kong History Museum and the Hong Kong Science Museum, with plenty of interesting exhibitions and play facilities to choose from.In addition to Hong Kong's specialty street food, Tsim Sha Tsui is also home to Michelin-starred restaurants and local cuisine. The apartment is newly decorated and clean, the lobby is large, it can accommodate a large number of people, both rooms have double beds, private bathrooms and kitchens, the first choice for groups and family ports.
host_about:
你好,我係Sam,是土生土長香港人｡從小到大,我都喜歡背包旅行, 以前覺得香港天空好小, 好羨慕外國的天空好大,四圍都有綠油油的森林和草地｡望住天空,就好想走去看看天空另一面的世界是怎樣｡15歲那年暑假決定出走一次,帶住背包,一個人闖蕩西藏旅行45日,從此,一發不可收拾!

記得最激一次,是大學跟四位同學從廣州徒步到內蒙古｡經歷70多日的艱苦路程,回憶畢身難忘｡每一次旅程,除了令人難忘的風景,跟當地人的交流互動,都是每一次旅行都獨一無二的重要原素｡所以我希望透過開辦民宿旅館,認識世界各地不同的客人,希望我可以代表香港,歡迎每一位來到我們家的客人｡讓大家感受香港人這個城市的人情味和好客之道｡

name: Spacious Family friendly 3BR Apt in Quarry Bay
description: We would love to welcome you in our family home in Quarry Bay. The flat is spacious 1200 sqf with three bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, have fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer. Our place is geared towards family with small children where you don’t need to worry about toys and safety for small kids. This is also the place we live so pardon for the occasional clutter, or unfinished projects that family of young children have. However, we will keep maintain the house as clutter free as possible.
neighborhood_overview:
25 mins to central by MTR or 722 bus
10 mins to causeway bay by MTR
75 mins from airport by A12 bus
60 mins to Disneyland by A12 bus + 5-10 mins by R8 bus from Lantau Link plaza
30 mins to Mong Kok

The neighbourhood is more of suburbs area but you definitely won’t miss out the city vibe! 10 mins to big malls like City plaza and Kornhill plaza where you can go for movies, food, ice skating, and also shopping. Cityplaza has some big high street brands like uniqlo, H&M, Zara in case you need some last minute shopping. Aeon also really decent department store where they also sell Disney clothes (again, if you forgot to buy some from your trip to Disneyland).

๑۩۞۩๑ APARTMENT INTERIOR ๑۩۞۩๑

host_about:
I love to meet different people and visit to other places, visiting the local farmer's market and experience and live like a local using bnb.  

I have been airbnb host since 2011 for 11 years already.  So Glad to have over 750 guest reviews!!  We worked so hard to keep happy guests but only 20% of guests spend their precious time to write reviews :-)  CHEERS to all supportive new guests, return guests and referred guests.  I hope to serve you better.  Please do give us private feedback anytime and I valued your feedback and will improve my apartments.  I am so glad many of you appreciate all the hard work and bare with the occasionally 1% silly mistake / fault / defect I have made.  Thank you so much for your patient.  

Again, should you need anything during your stay, don't be shy, please do let me know via calling or email me.  I am more than happy to provide suggestion / immediate assistant / support as soon as possible.

*********************************************************************************
FOR NEW airbnb user, below are some of the FAQ links for your perusal (questions & answers useful for new user). Please do let me know if you have any problem, my response would be faster than airbnb support team as sometimes their hotline as very busy (but I only can help you on general question).

GENERAL FAQ for guests before booking 
www.airbnb.com/help/topic/traveling

FAQ: What are Airbnb Service Fees? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/104

FAQ: For How to Book 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/85

FAQ: For How to make a payment / reservation 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/126

FAQ: For How to Contact Airbnb Support 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/9

FAQ: How and when do I make a payment for my reservation? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/92

FAQ: How can I view or print a billing receipt or itinerary for my trip? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/100

FAQ: How are cleaning fees added? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/58

FAQ: How does the Airbnb payment system work? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/51

We strongly recommend reviewing all cancellation policies before making your reservations: www.airbnb.com/home/cancellation_policies?guest_fee_policy=grace_period_48_hours#strict-with-grace

FAQ: When do I pay for my long-term reservation?
www.airbnb.com/help/question/245

Due to the reason that Sep-Apr is peak season, you are advised to make your reservation earlier.   I can only do first book first serve basis, where I won't cancel current booking just because other guests have a longer / bigger booking.  Due to strict cancellation policy, I haven't cancel guest booking so far, except from time to time having guest need to cancel or amend their booking due to different reason and we will considerate case by case (so far only full refund to 1 group of guest as they are able to provide document to proof that their immediate family member need emergency operation). 

Max Capacity is cater to big group consists of family n kids with standard asian size.  If group with members with huge body size or some members prefer to have a bed by their own, not sharing with other, then please split your group into two apartments for more comfortable stay.  I have tried my best to write the apartment description as detail as I could. Please spend time to read through before you book.  I am definitely happy to answer any question that is not in the apartment description.


Contact Number and Email Information will only be released until a booking is made. 

Below is the FAQ on airbnb “Why can’t I call or email a host before booking?”: www.airbnb.com/help/question/111

Hope this helps you get to know how airbnb works :-)

Ocean Park - 5 mins by taxi or MTR

host_about:
Hi there, same like everyone else, I love travelling, talking to different people, making new friends around the world

I have done some good travelings and stayed in some exotic places. I have lived in India and Mexico for 6 months each, while I have also travelled around Europe (UK, France, Germany, Turkey, Hungary, Austria, Czech, Iceland, Italy, Greece), Asia (Japan, Korea, China, Taiwan, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam, Cambodia, Philippines, Thailand, Indonesia, India, Nepal), America (USA, Mexico, Cuba).

Among all places, Cuba is my favourite and I love it so much that I have been there twice, and will keep going back for sure.  It is such a beautiful untouched place. Everything stay the same like 1959 with all the antique cars and buildings, as if there is a timing machine, so lovely. and Che Guevara is my idol, there are so many things I am happy to share. Will definitely do so when we meet.

description: Our house is perfect if you want to visit the exciting/chaotic Hong Kong but at the same time you want to relax and enjoy nature, tranquility and clean air.
neighborhood_overview:
Sai Kung is a unique chance to see the other side of Hong Kong. You can reach HK island in 40 min, Mong Kok and TST in 30 min by public transportation or taxi. From Sai Kung pier there are boats to islands and beaches. There are many hiking trails, water sports, indoor and outdoor activities.
You can enjoy BBQ in our patio or choose one of the many restaurants, seafood, bars, coffee shops in Sai Kung town. (7 min by bus/taxi)
You will wake up with the sound of birds and cicadas and our lovely helper Leslie can delight you with special breakfast... home made cake, fresh juice and much more. (On request and extra fee)
host_about:
I'm an open mind father of a lovely Family of four.  I'm living and working in Hong Kong with my wife and my two kids. 
We are happy and we feel privileged to have had the opportunity to move from Italy to HK. It has been very challenging!!!
We love travelling.
We are used to spend summer holiday in our nice house in Italy and during winter time we like to travel around Asia.
We are Italian, I'm an entrepreneur and my wife is a Veterinarian
My kids are students and they like to play rugby,  I help the team as a coach.
We live in a nice village house in Sai Kung , Hong Kong. 
Our Home in Italy is a Semi detach house. My brother lives next to our house  and he can always help if necessary.
Giorgio is your main contact since he manages my house in Italy. 
You will know him during your booking. 
Regarding Our house in Hong Kong I'm that one is following the booking, check in/out ecc ecc.
Have a nice stay !
neighbourhood: Sai Kung, New Territories, Hong Kong

The Grand Blossom is a serviced residence located at 123 Hongqiuli Street, with over 700 square feet of 3-bedroom residential units, some with day and night sea views of Victoria Harbour.The unit has a simple and comfortable interior design, fully furnished, high-speed Wi-Fi internet, independent air conditioning, and a private kitchen for cooking, dedicated to providing a quality and comfortable accommodation environment in the hotel's operating mode.

Check-in/out rules:
Check-in starts at 3pm, please contact us if your check-in time will be later than 9pm.
Until 11:00 a.m., if you request an extended check-out fee of HK $200 can be extended to 2:00 p.m., subject to same-day check-in.

Cleaning rules:
For stays of 5 nights or less, wash face towels, bath towels and bath mats are changed every day, and garbage in the trash can is recycled.

name: BigGroup 8-11pax (4BR+4T/B) 整套公寓 4套房 8-11人
description:
We are located in the tourist area of Kowloon. Heart of TST, Jordan, Yaumatie along Nathan Rd.
*40min from airport by busA21. (12th stop) & 2min walk from Prudential Centre stop
*10min walk from HighSpeed Railway & Macau Ferry
*30min to Disneyland, Ocean Park and other sightseeings by MTR
*15min walk to Star Ferry, Ave. of stars & Harbour city

We value our guests by providing excellent services to ensure Comfort, Hygience, & Safety.

Our place is licensed by Hotels & Guesthouses Authority
neighborhood_overview:
We are 2 min walk from the Jordan MTR station Exit D along Nathan Road or thru MTR Exit E (by escalator and 1 min walk to cross the road) to our Bldg.

Our place is very decent and wholesome location to live because it’s a residential home but along main road level. It’s just adjacent to Tak Sun Primary School. There are 2 bakeries and 2 Laundry shops in the building premises. There are also 7-11, Park N Shop, Watsons, JNC, Starbucks and 24 hours Mac Donald within the vicinity. Lots of fast food and restaurant to choose.

The Building is in the main road along Austin Road which makes it very accessible by all transportations but our flat is strategically in a quiet location that provides peace and complete relaxation to guest after a long and busy day out
host_about:
Hi I am Scylla Kwong

We have been hosting since 2015.

I am Filipina and my husband Ken is Chinese. We stay in HK for last 31 years. I speak fluent English/Tagalog while Ken speaks English/Chinese. We love traveling and eating different cuisine around the globe.
We provide a clean, safe, accessible & affordable place for you to live in Hong Kong. 

Happy to share with you about HK and provide you with tips and information.

Wish to meet you soon

name: Spacious&Cosy 2BR TST MTR (700sqft)
description:
Designed by an Italian architect, this appartment was made to welcome families and large groups traveling together in the most comfortable manner.

Located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui in Mirador Mansion, with an uncommonly big surface in Hong Kong of 700 sqf, you also have a direct and easy access to the HK subway (MTR).

My apartment is surrounded by 4 MTR exists so you don't have to walk !
It is also 5min away from Kowloon High Speed Rail station!
neighborhood_overview:
My apartment is conveniently placed in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, almost everything worth visiting is just 5 minutes walk away!

First transportation is incredibly convenient since there are so many MTR exits all around my building so you have literally just 10 seconds to walk to get into my building!
exits D1 and D2 are both in Carnarvon Road side, exit D3 is in Bristol Avenue side in the famous K11 mall, this exit has a lift in B2 floor which you can take if you have luggage.
exit N5 is in Mody Road side.

The famous Avenue of Stars is at only 5 minutes walk. This is where you can take photos of the famous Bruce Lee statue and also all other famous Hong Kong actors!

This is also where you can see the symphony of lights at 8PM every night: all the famous Hong Kong side buildings illuminate and play light animations all together at 8PM.

Good news for the shopping lovers : my apartment is 5 minutes walk away from the harbour city lux
host_about:
Dear Airbnb friends,

It is my pleasure to meet you here, through this great community of travelling and sharing people from all over the world.

I am proud to say that I am a self made woman and that I succeeded in the businesses I've built for the last few years.

I am now able to freely enjoy my passions, mostly nature photography and travelling.

I have lived in Hong Kong for the last 10 years. I felt in love with this city, and I will probably spent many more years here.

Diversity, culture, food, nature, there is everything you may be looking for here.

So don't wait any longer and come to visit Hong Kong!

name: Mixed Dorm Bed#N@269 Hennessy Road
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
neighborhood_overview:
Check Inn HK’s place is located in Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong.
Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

description:
Located in Tsim Sha Tsui, 6 minutes from Tsim Sha Tsui Harbour Railway exit P3, near Hong Kong History Museum and Hong Kong Science Museum with plenty of interesting exhibitions and entertainment options.If you love shopping, you can't miss the big shopping centers nearby - TheOne, Melbourne and the nearby K11, iSquare and more.In addition to Hong Kong's specialty street food, Tsim Sha Tsui is also home to Michelin-starred restaurants and local cuisine. neighborhood_overview:
Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.

Wan Chai is a food paradise!Why is that?Just look at how many Michelin restaurants are around our neighborhood.Wan Chai is also a region with local characteristics (such as Blue House, Taiyuan Street), but it is also seamlessly connected with the international area of Hong Kong, such as Central, Causeway Bay.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

description:
Thank you for coming to Hong Kong. We are happy to give you travel tips turning around in HK.

Our property is located in Pak On Bldg, Austin Road - the Centre of HK, Jordan, next to Tsim Sha Tsui. You can find all you need nearby, restaurants (from fast food to high class, local food or any country cuisines), shopping malls, transportation terminus (coach bus to China, Ferry to Macau), vehicles to reach out all tourist spots. It is accessible.

We are flexible to cater your travel needs too.
neighborhood_overview:
Our place is located in the unit A4 4/F of Pak On Bldg, 105 Austin Road, Jordan. We have 24 hours building access with lift service. Our apartment is accessible 24 hours daily. Each guest has their own room key/password for their safety and privacy. We have a landline and free WiFi available for you to use.
We are in a very accessible location to provide you convenience.
* 1 minute walk to Jordan MTR Station Exit A
* 1 minute walk to bus stop to go anywhere in Kowloon or New Territories
* Less than an hour to or back to HK International Airport by Airport bus A22/E23/E23A/N11
* By Airport bus, you can go AsiaWorld Expo, Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (The longest bridge across the ocean)
* 10 minutes walk to China HK City, you can go Macao or China by Ferry
* 5 minutes walk to nearby coach bus Terminus to go China/Macao
* 5 minutes Mini Bus to HungHom Railway Terminal to China
* 10 minutes walk to different museum, like Museum of History, Sc
host_about:
I live to eat! So I travel to meet new friends, see new places and explore different delicacies of different places in the world! 

I am a Filipina and my husband Ken is a local HK person. As a host, we match most of our guest expectations. We are hospitable and friendly family and we put cleanliness of our premises as priority. HK is also our expertise being a residence here for few decades. We give good tips to our guest to maximize their enjoyment during their stay in HK. We will be happy to host all kinds of tourist in HK coming from different parts of the world and from all walks of life.

我住的吃!所以,我出差到结识新朋友,看到新的地方,探索在世界不同的地方不同的美味佳肴!

我是菲律宾人,我的丈夫肯是当地的香港人士｡作为东道主,我们最符合我们的客户的期望｡我们是好客和友好的家庭,我们把我们的场地作为优先清洁度｡香港也是我们的专长在这里是一个住所几十年｡我们给予好的建议给我们的客人他们在香港逗留期间,最大限度地发挥他们的享受｡我们将很乐意举办香港各类游客来自世界各地和各行各业的到来｡

host_about: 我是在長洲土生土長的原居民, 從出生到現在組織了家庭都是住在這個小島, 這裡有著很多對我來說很美好及有價值的回憶, 很多朋友問我喜歡長洲嗎? 會不會很不方便因為只有坐船才可以進出?...我會說長洲是我家, 我很喜歡這裡! 我父親在這裡經營一間餅店, 是專門售賣平安包的老字號餅家, 也是供應平安包給太平清醮期間的指定餅家, 因此, 很多房客也會順道到我們的餅店買平安包呢!

host_about:
I love to meet different people and visit to other places, visiting the local farmer's market and experience and live like a local using bnb.  

I have been airbnb host since 2011 for 11 years already.  So Glad to have over 750 guest reviews!!  We worked so hard to keep happy guests but only 20% of guests spend their precious time to write reviews :-)  CHEERS to all supportive new guests, return guests and referred guests.  I hope to serve you better.  Please do give us private feedback anytime and I valued your feedback and will improve my apartments.  I am so glad many of you appreciate all the hard work and bare with the occasionally 1% silly mistake / fault / defect I have made.  Thank you so much for your patient.  

Again, should you need anything during your stay, don't be shy, please do let me know via calling or email me.  I am more than happy to provide suggestion / immediate assistant / support as soon as possible.

*********************************************************************************
FOR NEW airbnb user, below are some of the FAQ links for your perusal (questions & answers useful for new user). Please do let me know if you have any problem, my response would be faster than airbnb support team as sometimes their hotline as very busy (but I only can help you on general question).

GENERAL FAQ for guests before booking 
www.airbnb.com/help/topic/traveling

FAQ: What are Airbnb Service Fees? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/104

FAQ: For How to Book 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/85

FAQ: For How to make a payment / reservation 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/126

FAQ: For How to Contact Airbnb Support 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/9

FAQ: How and when do I make a payment for my reservation? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/92

FAQ: How can I view or print a billing receipt or itinerary for my trip? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/100

FAQ: How are cleaning fees added? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/58

FAQ: How does the Airbnb payment system work? 
www.airbnb.com/help/question/51

We strongly recommend reviewing all cancellation policies before making your reservations: www.airbnb.com/home/cancellation_policies?guest_fee_policy=grace_period_48_hours#strict-with-grace

FAQ: When do I pay for my long-term reservation?
www.airbnb.com/help/question/245

Due to the reason that Sep-Apr is peak season, you are advised to make your reservation earlier.   I can only do first book first serve basis, where I won't cancel current booking just because other guests have a longer / bigger booking.  Due to strict cancellation policy, I haven't cancel guest booking so far, except from time to time having guest need to cancel or amend their booking due to different reason and we will considerate case by case (so far only full refund to 1 group of guest as they are able to provide document to proof that their immediate family member need emergency operation). 

Max Capacity is cater to big group consists of family n kids with standard asian size.  If group with members with huge body size or some members prefer to have a bed by their own, not sharing with other, then please split your group into two apartments for more comfortable stay.  I have tried my best to write the apartment description as detail as I could. Please spend time to read through before you book.  I am definitely happy to answer any question that is not in the apartment description.


Contact Number and Email Information will only be released until a booking is made. 

Below is the FAQ on airbnb “Why can’t I call or email a host before booking?”: www.airbnb.com/help/question/111

Hope this helps you get to know how airbnb works :-)

name: Antique Cosy Houseboat @ Aberdeen Fishing Village
description: According to Hong Kong Shipping Ordinance, for chartering local registered pleasure boats, the customer must sign a charter agreement, and the houseboat can only be used for pleasure purposes, and guests can use the vessel properly during the rental period.
neighborhood_overview:
The houseboat is located near the Aberdeen Fish Market in South of Hong Kong Island. Close to Aberdeen and Ap Lei Chau (Lei Tung MTR Station). It has an authentic 360 harbour view, experiencing the sunlight and sea breeze.

Nearby Attractions
Ocean Park - 5 mins by taxi or MTR
Hong Kong University (Hike to the Peak) - 15 mins by minibus or taxi
Central / Causeway Bay / Wan Chai- 15 mins by MTR, bus or taxi
Deep Water Bay / Repulse Bay Beaches / Stanley Market - 10-15 mins by taxi
Ferries directly from Aberdeen to Lamma Island / Po Toi Island / Cheung Chau Island

The houseboat is located in Hong Kong's fishing port south of Hong Kong Island, near Hong Kong's fishing center, Duck Chow (Lidong Metro Station), with 360-degree view of the fishing port

Nearby Attractions:
- Ocean Park: 5 minutes by MTR/Taxi Directly
- University of Hong Kong (walk to the top of the hill): 15 minutes by minibus direct
- Central/Causeway
host_about:
Hi there, same like everyone else, I love travelling, talking to different people, making new friends around the world

I have done some good travelings and stayed in some exotic places. I have lived in India and Mexico for 6 months each, while I have also travelled around Europe (UK, France, Germany, Turkey, Hungary, Austria, Czech, Iceland, Italy, Greece), Asia (Japan, Korea, China, Taiwan, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam, Cambodia, Philippines, Thailand, Indonesia, India, Nepal), America (USA, Mexico, Cuba).

Among all places, Cuba is my favourite and I love it so much that I have been there twice, and will keep going back for sure.  It is such a beautiful untouched place. Everything stay the same like 1959 with all the antique cars and buildings, as if there is a timing machine, so lovely. and Che Guevara is my idol, there are so many things I am happy to share. Will definitely do so when we meet.

host_about: 我是在長洲土生土長的原居民, 從出生到現在組織了家庭都是住在這個小島, 這裡有著很多對我來說很美好及有價值的回憶, 很多朋友問我喜歡長洲嗎? 會不會很不方便因為只有坐船才可以進出?...我會說長洲是我家, 我很喜歡這裡! 我父親在這裡經營一間餅店, 是專門售賣平安包的老字號餅家, 也是供應平安包給太平清醮期間的指定餅家, 因此, 很多房客也會順道到我們的餅店買平安包呢!

neighborhood_overview:

There are 2 bakeries and 2 Laundry shops in the building premises. There are also 7-11, Park N Shop, Watsons, JNC, Starbucks and 24 hours Mac Donald within the vicinity. Lots of fast food and restaurant to choose.

description: Families will definitely appreciate this centrally-located place that takes you anywhere.
host_about: 我是在長洲土生土長的原居民, 從出生到現在組織了家庭都是住在這個小島, 這裡有著很多對我來說很美好及有價值的回憶, 很多朋友問我喜歡長洲嗎? 會不會很不方便因為只有坐船才可以進出?...我會說長洲是我家, 我很喜歡這裡! 我父親在這裡經營一間餅店, 是專門售賣平安包的老字號餅家, 也是供應平安包給太平清醮期間的指定餅家, 因此, 很多房客也會順道到我們的餅店買平安包呢!

name: Executive Premier Suite 2BR 8pax MTR TST K11
description:
Dear Airbnb guests,


I am pleased to welcome you to my brand new apartment. As a designer and architect, I did my best to renovate it in the most cosy, spacious and convenient way for you. 700sqft of luxurious and comfy space will be yours.

Located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui district, it is right in front of MTR station (no need to walk!) and next to several shopping malls such as K11, 5min walk from Avenue of Stars, 8min from Harbour City
neighborhood_overview:
I love my district as it is in the heart of TSIM SHA TSUI, the best place to discover and enjoy Hong Kong as a local.
There are 3 MTR (subway) exits around my building, literally less than 1min walk.
It is the most convenient place as it is on Nathan Road, the famous and large street full of malls, fancy shops and tasty restaurants.
You can easily go to shopping malls such as K11 (2min walk) or The One (5min walk).
Harbour City is around 5min walk.
The Avenue of Stars is 7min walk.
Many restaurants and street food all around!
KNUTSFORD TERRACE is just 5min by walk! There you can enjoy many bars, exotic restaurants, clubs, pools..

I hope you will enjoy as much as I do!

description:

Room features with 2 double beds, open kitchen & sea view balcony app. 45 sq. meter in size, available for 4-5 guests. Extra bed available with extra charge. Air-con, Wi-Fi, fridge, TV, electric kettle, hairdryer, work top, bathroom amenities, in-outdoor slippers, coffee and tea bags are well equipped.
neighborhood_overview:
Our hotel is located in front of the "Hung Shing Yeh Beach" (20 minutes walk away from the Yung Shue Wan pier). Also we have a beach view restaurant serving with a variety of western dishes, alcohol, drinks and desserts. Our operation hour is from 9:00 am to 9:00 pm.

Nearby, there is a hiking trail heading to Sok Kwu Wan, passes through Mo Tat Wan, Yung Shue Ha and Tung O. From the top, you can oversee the most beautiful sights from the entire island and surrounding lands across.

If you are looking for more local traditional sceneries, you can't miss the "Lamma Wind Power Station", "Fisherman Village" and much more handcrafted souvenir stores.

name: Large 3 bedroom designer apartment, huge terrace
description:
This large bright family apartment is located in trendy Tai Hang Village. 3 bedrooms; a queen with side study, single bedroom with a bed and cot and baby room with a cot. We have a baby and a toddler so have 2 highchairs and toys.

We're a short stroll from cafes (Fine print!), restaurants, Victoria Park and Causeway Bay but the apartment is super quiet and peaceful.
The queen bedroom opens up to a huge terrace with sea and mountain views, comfy couches, a dining table, outdoor fan and a BBQ.
neighborhood_overview:
Just a stone’s throw away from the ever-bustling Causeway Bay (and often overshadowed by it), Tai Hang offers a rare pocket of respite that’s often hard to find on Hong Kong Island. Home to a funky array of indie cafes, hidden shops, local eateries, and historic landmarks, this charming neighbourhood is an understatedly hip area that we’ll never get tired of visiting. Here are just some of our favourite spots to hit up in Tai Hang, most of which offer delivery and takeaway options too.

What is Tai Hang known for?
Come Mid-Autumn Festival – which usually takes place in late September to early October – locals from around the city gather in Tai Hang for the annual Fire Dragon Dance, one of the most spectacular traditions during the festival. This ancient ritual sees a 67 metre-long dragon (the head alone weighs 48kg) with 72,000 incense sticks burning on its body, being carried through the streets of Tai Hang by hundreds of performers. neighborhood_overview:
Discover Tseung Kwan O (TKO) - The Pulse of Hong Kong:

Located in the vibrant neighbourhood of Tseung Kwan O, often abbreviated as TKO, our residence positions you in one of Hong Kong's newest and rapidly flourishing areas.

Waterfront Wonders:
The scenic waterfront is the gem of TKO. Lined with numerous restaurants, pubs, and gyms, it's an idyllic blend of leisure and lifestyle. Whether you fancy an early morning jog, a leisurely bicycle ride, or simply wish to revel in the calming ambiance with a stroll, the waterfront is the place to be.

Convenience at Every Corner:
Everything you might require is virtually on your doorstep. From educational institutions, with numerous schools dotting the area, to shopping destinations boasting malls, supermarkets, and fresh markets, TKO ensures you're never left wanting.

Culinary Delights:
The neighbourhood offers an impressive variety of eateries. From local delicacies to international cuis

name: A LUXURY HOME ON THE SOUTHSIDE
description: A calm, stylish space! Highly sought for photo shoots & production. Experience a Hongkong beachside luxury living at it's finest!
host_about:
KUBO is all about ...  
Lifestyle.Living.Design.

Come and experience Hong Kong like it's your second home.  
Instinctively, as seasoned travelers, we know how to fill the needs of fellow travelers. A HOME AWAY FROM HOME.

Since  Hongkong has an increasing demand on the nightly rental & short term lease & with soaring prices to boot, KUBO had chosen to  share a number of it's well designed spaces with the emergence of a new breed of savvy  "travelers-on-a- budget" as inspiration.

KUBO's  lifestyle team was conceptualised and spearheaded by a dynamic and upwardly mobile design visionary. A world class  hotelier in a past life and owner of multi homes. Always a home-lover whose goal  is to  create a restful cocoon for others.  Being aware of  how exciting yet daunting it can be to travel to a foreign land  and knowing the costs of comfort can prove to be astronomical these days, KUBO aims to answer accommodation needs by giving the best hospitality at an attractive budget!

COMFORT &  LOCATION is  KUBO's strength and giving the BEST HOSPITALITY ON A BUDGET is it's driving force!

Choose from a SELECTION OF PROPERTIES where the highest premium is put on privacy & design. Share the various dwellings & experience the many facets of Hongkong.

The KUBO team can communicate in English, Italian and Pilipino.

Give us a shout and let's start chatting!
 Safe travels!

name: tranquil apt in citycenter with rooftop to chill
description:
Stylish and spacious place in heart of hong kong. 1600 st ft living plus same size rooftop. Its surrounded by green and tranquil setting, yet walking distance to causeway bay, at heart of the city One will find supermarkets and coffee shops and restaurants by walking distance.
It is a safe neighbourhood. It's on a 3rd floor walk up in a colonial low-rise.

host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview: Cheung Chau covers an area of about 3 square kilometers and is famous for its unique coastal scenery.The Northern Emperor Temple on the island was built during the Qianlong Years of the Qing Dynasty and was the venue for the annual event, Taiping and Qingqing.Fishing boats and seafood pubs abound along the coast, and the sandy beaches and scenic family trails attract many who wish to escape the hassle of vacationing.In recent years, many young people have moved to Changzhou and opened specialty shops suitable for punching cards, injecting new vitality into the island.

With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Unique Secluded Beachfront Getaway (Family Unit)
description:
You won’t want to leave this charming, one-of-a-kind place.

Nestled away on a secluded beach on Chi Ma Wan Peninsula (Lantau Island South), you will find a unique location with stunning sunset views, once a film location for the famous film *Double Impact (1991)* starring Jean-Claude Van Damme & Bolo Yeung, that has prevailed over time and is once again looking at a worthy rediscovery.
A Homestead in the re-making, built on true old-fashioned values with sustainability on the top of our minds.
neighborhood_overview:
Nestled in a secluded bay where the closest road (taxi access) and residences are ~2km away (20-30min on foot).
Access also by Sampan / Boat via Cheung Chau Island or Mui Wo to the Mong Tung Wan House Pier.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our charming Airbnb located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong's most vibrant and iconic tourist destination. Immerse yourself in the bustling energy of this lively neighborhood and experience the best that the city has to offer.

Nestled along the beautiful Victoria Harbour, Tsim Sha Tsui is a melting pot of culture, history, and entertainment. The neighborhood is renowned for its unique blend of old-world charm and modern sophistication, offering an unforgettable experience for travelers of all kinds.

As you step outside our doorstep, you'll find yourself surrounded by a myriad of attractions and landmarks. Explore the iconic Avenue of Stars, a tribute to Hong Kong's thriving film industry, and take in breathtaking views of the glittering skyline. The Star Ferry Pier is just a short stroll away, allowing you to embark on a picturesque boat ride across the harbor, providing unforgettable photo opportunities.

name: Lamma Island Palace
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space, and enjoy the beauty of Lamma with the convenience of staying by the pier.
A rare find, not normally available except that we are traveling.
Whether you live in Hong Kong and looking for a temporary palace, or traveling and looking to stay close to the beach yet close to the city, this place is where you want to be.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is a 3 minute walk from the ferry pier to HK Island and to Aberdeen. It is a 5 minute walk from two different beaches and 10 minutes to a third.
The house is in the heart of Yung Shue Wan and is right next to all the shops and restaurants of Lamma Island.
There are many hiking trails you could start right from the doorstep.

Lamma is a unique gem in a country like hong kong, a serene cluster of villages in the jungle with an addictively relaxed pace. Many residents compare the island to Bali or Phuket for its unique energy, although the convenience of being so close to the bustling city centre of Hong Kong makes it easier to integrate both lifestyles.

The ferry leaves every 30 minutes and takes 25 minutes to cross over to Central, across the road from the IFC, the pinnacle of centricity in HK including the direct line to the AirPort Express.
neighbourhood: Lamma Island, New Territories, Hong Kong

name: (WF8) 尖沙咀，香港科學館旁，距離地鐵7分鐘，2房大廳，獨立廚廁
description: Located in Tsim Sha Tsui, 6 minutes from Tsim Sha Tsui Harbour Railway exit P3, near Hong Kong History Museum and Hong Kong Science Museum with plenty of interesting exhibitions and entertainment options.If you love shopping, you can't miss the big shopping centers nearby - TheOne, Melbourne and the nearby K11, iSquare and more.In addition to Hong Kong's specialty street food, Tsim Sha Tsui is also home to Michelin-starred restaurants and local cuisine. The apartment is newly decorated with a large lobby that can accommodate multiple people, 2 rooms with double single beds, and a private bathroom and kitchen, which are the preferred choice for groups and family ports.
host_about:
你好,我係Sam,是土生土長香港人｡從小到大,我都喜歡背包旅行, 以前覺得香港天空好小, 好羨慕外國的天空好大,四圍都有綠油油的森林和草地｡望住天空,就好想走去看看天空另一面的世界是怎樣｡15歲那年暑假決定出走一次,帶住背包,一個人闖蕩西藏旅行45日,從此,一發不可收拾!

記得最激一次,是大學跟四位同學從廣州徒步到內蒙古｡經歷70多日的艱苦路程,回憶畢身難忘｡每一次旅程,除了令人難忘的風景,跟當地人的交流互動,都是每一次旅行都獨一無二的重要原素｡所以我希望透過開辦民宿旅館,認識世界各地不同的客人,希望我可以代表香港,歡迎每一位來到我們家的客人｡讓大家感受香港人這個城市的人情味和好客之道｡

My place is close to the city center, parks, center of performing arts and culture. You’ll love my place because of the location, the people, the ambiance, and the neighborhood.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our charming Airbnb located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong's most vibrant and iconic tourist destination. Immerse yourself in the bustling energy of this lively neighborhood and experience the best that the city has to offer.

Nestled along the beautiful Victoria Harbour, Tsim Sha Tsui is a melting pot of culture, history, and entertainment. The neighborhood is renowned for its unique blend of old-world charm and modern sophistication, offering an unforgettable experience for travelers of all kinds.

As you step outside our doorstep, you'll find yourself surrounded by a myriad of attractions and landmarks. Explore the iconic Avenue of Stars, a tribute to Hong Kong's thriving film industry, and take in breathtaking views of the glittering skyline. The Star Ferry Pier is just a short stroll away, allowing you to embark on a picturesque boat ride across the harbor, providing unforgettable photo opportunities.

neighborhood_overview:
Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) is a vibrant and bustling district in Hong Kong that offers a mix of cultural, shopping, dining, and entertainment experiences. Here are some of the best spots and aspects to explore in Tsim Sha Tsui:

Victoria Harbour: Tsim Sha Tsui offers stunning views of Victoria Harbour, especially during the evening when the Symphony of Lights show illuminates the skyline. The waterfront promenade is a great place for a leisurely stroll and to take in the iconic Hong Kong skyline.

Avenue of Stars: Modeled after the Hollywood Walk of Fame, the Avenue of Stars honors Hong Kong's film industry. Visitors can find handprints of famous celebrities, enjoy the view of the harbor, and catch the nightly light show.

Tsim Sha Tsui Promenade: Take a leisurely walk along the waterfront promenade for breathtaking views of the cityscape and the harbor. It's a popular spot for locals and tourists alike.

name: Charming Villa w/ Pool & Rooftop
description:
Create unforgettable memories at this unique and family-friendly place. A 3-storey charming villa located in the beautiful South Lantau within walking distance Pui O Beach. Equipped with full amenities including:
- swimming pool
- rooftop w/ outdoor dining table
- gas BBQ stove
- sauna & steam room facilities
- pool table
- movie projector
- open kitchen with oven and dishwasher
- kids trampoline
- open bar
- basketball, soccer, badminton, kids games
- kayak and standup paddles for rental
neighborhood_overview:
Pui O, located on the southern shoreline of Lantau Island, is an old fishing village with a picturesque setting between mountains and a long stretch of open beach. It has become a popular weekend and holiday destination for locals and visitors alike.

The main attraction of Pui O is its family-friendly beach, which spans approximately 700 meters from west to east. Visitors can enjoy various recreational activities and soak up the sun, providing a refreshing escape from the city's hustle and bustle.

Walking between the beach and the main village, you will pass through paddocks where Hong Kong's beloved feral buffalo, also known as cows, can often be spotted. Some of them even make their way to the beach. Along the South Lantau Island Road that cuts through the village, there are a few restaurants to satisfy your hunger.

At the eastern end of Pui O Beach, you can find the historic Tin Hau Temple, which is worth a quick visit for its cultural significance.<

description: Discover the best of Hong Kong, with this three bedroom apartment in Mid-Levels West. with high floor views over the city. neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is in Mid-Levels West, an upscale area with better air quality near Lung Fu Shan Country Park and scenic hikes. The area is served by buses, trams, & near the MTR.
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

description:

The Cave, incorporates a subdued palette and organic textures found in nature, evoking a visual and metaphysical connection to the environment. neighborhood_overview:
Tourist hospitality is a major industry in Tsim Sha Tsui. The area has the highest concentration of hotels in Hong Kong. Some of the hotels include The Peninsula, Rosewood Hong Kong, Kowloon Shangri-La, InterContinental Hong Kong, The Mira Hong Kong, Baden-Powell International House, Hotel Icon, and the Hotel Panorama. The Hyatt Regency Hong Kong was closed on 1 January 2006 and the iSQUARE shopping mall was built at its former location; it re-opened in October 2009 on Hanoi Road of Tsim Sha Tsui within the new The Masterpiece skyscraper. Other hotels in virtually every price range and level of luxury can be found throughout the area; Chungking Mansions is known for providing cheap lodging for backpackers.

Tsim Sha Tsui is one of many places to find exotic restaurants in Hong Kong. Hillwood Road at the north of Observatory Hill concentrates on restaurants of different national dishes. Knutsford Terrace on the other side of the hill is a terrace of pubs. Kimberley Street is f
