neighborhood_overview:
If retail runs through Hong Kong’s arteries, then Causeway Bay is the beating heart that keeps it going. From big-name designer brands piled atop one another in gleaming glass towers to rising stars in street style, fashion feels at home in the district. However, it’s much more than just a shopper’s paradise. Venture beyond the multitude of malls and discover an alluring enclave that’s brimming with character, Hong Kong Island’s largest public park and a rich history tied to its past as a former fishing village.

Named after the cove that it’s now built on top of, Causeway Bay’s erstwhile coastline is today marked by Tung Lo Wan Road, while landmarks including a 19th century Tin Hau temple dedicated to the Goddess of the Sea, the Noon Day Gun and a bronze statue of British monarch Queen Victoria recall the territory’s Chinese and British influences.

Now home to some of the highest retail rents in the world, the area’s eye-watering real estate has forced businesses
host_about: Hello! I was born in Hong Kong. I love for travel knows no bounds, and recently, I embarked on a new adventure—I got married!  As if that weren’t exciting enough, I’ve also taken on the role of a new Airbnb host. My energy and passion drive me to create memorable experiences for my guests. Whether it’s exploring the vibrant streets of Hong Kong or sharing travel stories, I’m always up for an adventure. Let’s make every moment count!

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our charming Airbnb located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong's most vibrant and iconic tourist destination. Immerse yourself in the bustling energy of this lively neighborhood and experience the best that the city has to offer.

Nestled along the beautiful Victoria Harbour, Tsim Sha Tsui is a melting pot of culture, history, and entertainment. The neighborhood is renowned for its unique blend of old-world charm and modern sophistication, offering an unforgettable experience for travelers of all kinds.

As you step outside our doorstep, you'll find yourself surrounded by a myriad of attractions and landmarks. Explore the iconic Avenue of Stars, a tribute to Hong Kong's thriving film industry, and take in breathtaking views of the glittering skyline. The Star Ferry Pier is just a short stroll away, allowing you to embark on a picturesque boat ride across the harbor, providing unforgettable photo opportunities.

name: 元朗五星级01独立3室公寓
description: A home away from home in the heart of the city.
host_about: 我是个热情的海外中国人，记得我第一次出国，当时选择酒店住，服务生很格式，不愿意告诉我当地我需要的信息，我想完了！这样这次变得只能看街景，什么信息都获取不了。后来我选择爱彼迎，住在当地人家里，房东告诉我所有我想知道的资讯，比如从什么途径获取当地政府信息，从什么地方获取行业息，办什么事要找那个部门，哪些景点有美丽的故事，出门要怎么坐车或打车。哇靠！这些都是在网上找不到的资讯，住家让我有家的感觉，太好了！当时我就在想是不是很多来到到陌生世界的人是否都和我一样的需求？现在我家里几乎成了小小的委事机构，有人要来生孩子、有人要买房租房、有孩子要来留学的、有人需要采购安全食品及物资邮寄的，只要有时间我都会努力去办！

name: 3Bdrm Family Apt in Causeway Bay: 1min Tin Hau MTR
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place that is just 20 second walk to Tin Hau MTR Station.

Alternatively, Causeway Bay is just a 8 mins walk. For park lover, Victoria Park is opposite the apartment.

Tin Hau is regarded as a residential neighbourhood with a lot of good local food.. There is also a supermarket in the same block as the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
Bordering Causeway Bay and alongside Tai Hang, sits the laid-back Tin Hau. With easy access to public transport and proximity to Hong Kong’s Central Business District, this charming neighbourhood blends incredible convenience with an endless array of dining, entertainment and cultural options to keep you excited.

For family with kids, Victoria Park is right across the apartment. there are 2 big playground, swimming pool, roller skating ring, ping pong, basketball and tennis court kids can be entertained. This is one of the bigger parks in HK Island.
host_about:
Hi, we are Lester and Liz, your friendly Airbnb hosts. 

As passionate traveler ourselves and experienced hosts in Japan and Singapore, we understand the importance of finding a comfortable and welcoming place to stay.

Whether you are here for a business trip, or an extended stay, we are committed to providing you with a seamless and enjoyable experience.

We look forward to hosting you and making your stay in Hong Kong a truly memorable one.

name: Three-Bedroom Apartment for 16@269 Hennessy Road
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.
host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

neighborhood_overview: The district is mainly an area of mixed residential and retail. During day time, the Yau Ma Tei wet market and fruit market are the markets to visit, buying souvenirs like dried noodles and some fruits. Every night there is a market selling many different kinds of products including clothes, decorations, VCD and toys in Temple Street, a street in the area where the famous Tin Hau Temple was built in 1876. The Temple is at Public Square Street. The square, known as Yung Shue Tau, was a night market. Jade Market and Jade Street, China's most revered green stone is in abundance here, with around 400 registered stall owners ready to pitch jade amulets, ornaments, necklaces and trinkets.

host_about:
Hello, fellow adventurers! I’m a forty-something guy who love in travel. My wife and our ten-year-old daughter are my favorite travel companions. Our adventures are filled with laughter, curiosity, and the joy of discovery. 

Very recently, I’ve taken the plunge into hosting! My wife and I manage this Airbnb together. She’s the creative genius behind the decor, and I handle the logistics. It’s a labor of love, and we can’t wait to welcome you!

The house is fully AC'd to cool down, but also enjoy the outdoors with a swim at the beach and an outdoor shower.

3 bedrooms:

- Guest room with queen bed, seperate bathroom
- Kids room with 4 beds in bunk (2x2)

host_about:
I like to travel to get to know interesting people and other cultures. My primary travel destinations are in Asia, as well as some parts of the United States and Europe. My favorite way to travel is to exchange experiences with locals, to discover their way of life.

My favorite sport is triathlon. I live in the city center of Amsterdam. Previously I have lived in Seoul, Taipei and Beijing.

name: (LM8) 1min to YMT MTR with  2 bedrooms
description:

Close to Temple Street, entertainment is different day and night. You may find fortune teller (feng shui) stalls, local food stalls, souvenir stalls, fruit and dessert shops all in this famous tourist spot to experience the night life of Hong Kong.
host_about: Hey there! I'm born in the '80s, and life has been quite the adventure. Imagine me with hiking boots laced up, ready to explore the winding trails of our beautiful city. But when I'm not chasing sunsets on the hills, I'm wielding a paintbrush like a wizard—colors dancing on canvas. But here's the best part: I'm all about warmth and politeness. Your comfort is my mission. So, welcome to our cozy Airbnb and make this stay unforgettable!

host_about:
嗨､親愛的朋友們､我喜歡認識､結交五湖四海､有素質､有禮貌的朋友､我也希望在香港為朋友們提供溫馨的家､家不需要很豪華､很大的地方､只要簡單､干淨､整洁､釆光､通風､家電廚具､生活用品齊全､睡覺安靜､溫馨已經足夠､這是我對家的要求､希望朋友們會喜歡我們香港的家喔､等你､､､､回家!
香港恋家公寓,立足于香港最兴旺的旺角商圈,无论是您需要就近旺角购物,还是在油麻地享受香港美食,我们都有精心设计的房源提供,所有房间摆设温馨,床上用品一客人一换,坚持高标准服务｡所有房屋都选定靠近香港地铁的位置,地铁到尖沙咀､铜锣湾､深港口岸､火车站､迪士尼､机场

name: 高级公寓 3个房2个厅1厨
description: There are three rooms in the house, the first room is the large room, the second room is the small room, the third room is a bunk bed.
host_about: 我是个热情的海外中国人，记得我第一次出国，当时选择酒店住，服务生很格式，不愿意告诉我当地我需要的信息，我想完了！这样这次变得只能看街景，什么信息都获取不了。后来我选择爱彼迎，住在当地人家里，房东告诉我所有我想知道的资讯，比如从什么途径获取当地政府信息，从什么地方获取行业息，办什么事要找那个部门，哪些景点有美丽的故事，出门要怎么坐车或打车。哇靠！这些都是在网上找不到的资讯，住家让我有家的感觉，太好了！当时我就在想是不是很多来到到陌生世界的人是否都和我一样的需求？现在我家里几乎成了小小的委事机构，有人要来生孩子、有人要买房租房、有孩子要来留学的、有人需要采购安全食品及物资邮寄的，只要有时间我都会努力去办！

name: Rare, Maison moderne avec Jardin
description:
Cut from your daily routine and relax in this unique and peaceful home, just renovated in the nature of Mui Wo.
20min walk/8min by bike from the ferry.
On the ground floor it has a large living room, a game room with 1 single bed, an equipped kitchen and a toilet.
Upstairs there is a children's room with a single bed and a baby bed, an adult room with a king size bed +, a bathroom and a dressing room.
There is also a large garden with swimming pool( summer) and a roof top.

host_about:
嗨､親愛的朋友們､我喜歡認識､結交五湖四海､有素質､有禮貌的朋友､我也希望在香港為朋友們提供溫馨的家､家不需要很豪華､很大的地方､只要簡單､干淨､整洁､釆光､通風､家電廚具､生活用品齊全､睡覺安靜､溫馨已經足夠､這是我對家的要求､希望朋友們會喜歡我們香港的家喔､等你､､､､回家!
香港恋家公寓,立足于香港最兴旺的旺角商圈,无论是您需要就近旺角购物,还是在油麻地享受香港美食,我们都有精心设计的房源提供,所有房间摆设温馨,床上用品一客人一换,坚持高标准服务｡所有房屋都选定靠近香港地铁的位置,地铁到尖沙咀､铜锣湾､深港口岸､火车站､迪士尼､机场
